p: Considering HCoV 229E, the inhibition percentages of viral infectivity ranged from 34% to 36% for the aqueous stem bark extracts and from 37% to 45% for the hydromethanolic stem bark extracts. Hydromethanolic stem barks extracts of M. alba var rosea led to production of the lowest HCoV 229E titer of 1.98 and inhibited viral infectivity down to 45%. With aqueous extracts, the highest inhibition percentage is 36% for M. alba var. rosea.
